law.catch_line: Employer Required To Reimburse Uncompensated Care Pool; Retaliation By Employer
law.text: [ Text of section effective until November 4, 2012. For text effective November 4, 2012, see below.] No employee shall be penalized by an employer as a result of such employee's filing of an application to the uncompensated care pool or otherwise providing notice to the division of health care finance and policy or to a health care provider in regard to the need for health care services for that employee that results in the employer being required to reimburse the pool in whole or in part. Chapter 149: Employer required to reimburse Health Safety Net Trust Fund; retaliation by employer prohibited [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 224, Sec. 139 effective November 4, 2012. For text effective until November 4, 2012, see above.] No employee shall be penalized by an employer as a result of such employee's filing of an application to the Health Safety Net Trust Fund or otherwise providing notice to the executive office of health and human services or to a health care provider in regard to the need for health care services for that employee that results in the employer being required to reimburse the fund in whole or in part.
